questions.question: 'She is my best friend,' he said. He said that she ............................. his best friend.
questions.description: Simple present tense in the direct speech becomes simple past tense in the indirect speech.

questions.question: 'She is waiting for us,' he said. /He said that she ............................... for them.
questions.description: Present continuous in the direct speech becomes past continuous in the indirect speech.

questions.question: 'I have visited all the continents,' he said. / He said that he ............................. all the continents.
questions.description: Present perfect in the direct speech becomes past perfect tense in the indirect speech.

questions.question: 'She has been living alone for years,' he said. / He said that she ............................... alone for years.
questions.description: Present perfect continuous in the direct speech becomes past perfect continuous in the indirect speech.

questions.question: 'She will help us,' he said. / He said that she .............................. help them.
questions.description: Will becomes would in the indirect speech.

questions.question: 'I want to go,' he said. He said that he .................................. to go.
questions.description: Simple present tense in the direct speech becomes simple past tense in the indirect speech.
